physical_appearance: "The image displays a black-and-white photograph. The photograph is encased in a black frame and it has a white border. It depicts the interior of a building, and shows numerous items such as furniture and flowers. A couple of carpets can be seen on the tiled flooring. At the left of the photograph, the head of a mannequin can be seen, atop the drawer. Below the image, ""Doris Geddes' Little Shop
